name: All Discs Roll The Same
procedure: Choose the geometry of the objects you would like to race down the incline.
Hold the starting block near the top of the inclined plane so that it blocks the objects from rolling.
Quickly move the starting block away from you and up to start the objects rolling down the incline.
Notice that, as long as you are using objects with the same geometry, they reach the bottom of the incline at the same time.

Repeat as desired using objects with different geometries or uniform densities: small sphere vs. large sphere, small ring vs. large ring, small disc vs. large disc and large aluminum disc vs. wooden disk vs. copper disc.
